reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 219/17: SPECIFIED BENEFIT PLANS THAT ARE QUALIFYING TRUSTS - ELECTION UNDER SUBSECTION 74.2 (3.1) OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: SPECIFIED BENEFIT PLANS THAT ARE QUALIFYING TRUSTS - ELECTION UNDER SUBSECTION 74.2 (3.1) OF THE ACT
reg_info.act_under: Corporations Tax Act   Loi sur l'imposition des sociétés

content.section: Prescribed period, par. 2 of s. 74.2 (3.1) of the Act
content.content: 1. For the purposes of paragraph 2 of subsection 74.2 (3.1) of the Act, the period of two years is prescribed for the following benefit plans: 1. The employee life and health trust known as USW Local 1005 ELHT. 2. The employee life and health trust known as USW Local 8782 ELHT. 3. The employee life and health trust known as Stelco Non-USW Retiree Life and Health Trust.
content.raw_html:
1. For the purposes of paragraph 2 of subsection 74.2 (3.1) of the Act, the period of two years is prescribed for the following benefit plans:

1. The employee life and health trust known as USW Local 1005 ELHT.

2. The employee life and health trust known as USW Local 8782 ELHT.

3. The employee life and health trust known as Stelco Non-USW Retiree Life and Health Trust.

content.section: Prescribed period, par. 2 of s. 74.2 (3.1) of the Act
content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).

content.section: Prescribed period, par. 2 of s. 74.2 (3.1) of the Act
